docs.snippet: Minnesota Timberwolves shooting guard Zach LaVine was enjoying a breakout third season, proving to all those who watched that he is so much more than just a dunker....

headline.main: Timberwolves Lose Zach LaVine for Rest of Season to Torn ACL

docs.snippet: The Trump administration has for now backed off a draft executive order that would have called for a review of whether the United States should reopen overseas "black site" prisons, where interrogation techniques often condemned as torture were us...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Trump administration has for now backed off a draft executive order that would have called for a review of whether the United States should reopen overseas "black site" prisons, where interrogation techniques often condemned as torture were used, U.S. officials have told Reuters.

headline.main: U.S. Backs Off Bid to Reopen CIA 'Black Site' Prisons: Officials
headline.print_headline: U.S. Backs Off Bid to Reopen CIA 'Black Site' Prisons: Officials

docs.snippet: Marek Hamsik and Dries Mertens both scored hat-tricks as Napoli demolished Bologna 7-1 away on Saturday after a wild first half which featured five goals, two sendings off and a missed penalty....
